SEARCH
Package com.pjv.Helpers

Class ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.pjv.Helpers.ComputerPlayer
public class ComputerPlayer extends Object
This class represents a computer player in the game. It handles the logic for making moves, including selecting random moves and handling trapped pieces.

    • choseStepsAmount

      public int choseStepsAmount()
      Chooses a random number of steps between 1 and 4.

    • getRandomMove

      public int[] getRandomMove(List<int[]> movesToChoose)
      Selects a random move from a list of possible moves.
      Parameters:
      movesToChoose - the list of possible moves
      Returns:
      the selected move as an array of two integers representing row and column shifts

    • wasTrapped

      public void wasTrapped(Move getmove)
      Records a move that resulted in a piece being trapped.
      Parameters:
      getmove - the move that caused the piece to be trapped

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove()
      Makes a move for the computer player by selecting a random piece and moving it in a random valid direction for a random number of steps.
